column4: the aircrack compatibility_drivers page  was last modified on September 25th. Does the rt2860 support injection now? Does anyone running *Karmic Koala* managed to inject with the rt2860 without recompiling the kernel?
I think there is a distro dedicated to that, I forget the name
you mean a karmic koala based distro?
don't think so.  Its called Backtrack
